abstract: International House Hunting column; renovated four-bedroom 19th century Victorian house located 20 miles from downtown Toronto is listed at $1.17 million; information about market and tips for buying in Ontario highlighted.
snippet: Toronto’s housing market is performing well, with the number of sales up 16 percent in the first quarter. A weak Canadian dollar has helped create foreign demand.
lead_paragraph: Toronto’s housing market is performing well, with the number of sales up 16 percent in the first quarter. A weak Canadian dollar has helped create foreign demand.
